expertAnnotation.title: Case Study: How Label Ladder Supports AI in Healthcare
expertAnnotation.subtitle: An international MedTech company wanted to develop an AI agent that automatically analyzes X-ray and CT images. For this, it needed tens of thousands of precisely labeled images to train the AI agent: a project that would have been too expensive and time-consuming internally. Internal recruitment and training of specialists alone would have taken months. At the same time, there was a lack of scalable processes to provide the data volume with the required quality and speed. And this is exactly where Label Ladder comes in.

how.title: How we implemented the project:
how.step1_description: We assembled a specialized team with additional medical training and trained it according to Swiss quality standards.
how.step2_description: The team labeled thousands of X-ray and CT images with clinical accuracy – including validation by medical specialists.
how.step3_description: All data was processed in HIPAA-compliant manner, standardized, and transferred for direct use into the client's systems.
